abstract: central florida blasts auburn with incredible chick-fil-a bowl billboard .
article: the chick-fil-a peach bowl is set to be a good one , with the undefeated university of central florida knights taking on the auburn tigers . the teams are sure to be practicing hard in preparation for the game , but it 's also important to take shots at the opponent and gain a mental advantage . it looks like ucf is ahead in the latter department . ucf vs auburn chick-fil-a peach bowl billboard by smaj pic . twitter . com/bxiz2fazqf -- popular dribbble december 22 , 2017 . ucf has been very confident in their ability to take down the tigers , and their leading rusher believes that auburn is in for a `` rude awakening '' at the peach bowl .

we 've seen central florida 's offensive firepower and auburn 's staunch defense , so this will surely be an entertaining matchup . ucf rb adrian killins says auburn is in for `` rude awakening '' at the peach bowl , believes sec lacks speed pic . twitter . com/yhu7imk330 -- bleacher report cfb december 14 , 2017 . whatever happens , it 's sure to be a great bowl game between two top programs on new year 's day . with ucf doing plenty of trash talking to a top sec team , the tigers will be out for blood in this one .
the knights are hoping they can remain the only undefeated team in college football , but they 'll have their hands full .
